title: When you the last player alive and the enemy after that penta kill . . .

replies.body:
no the true way to do this is play bard, get them a quad, then ult them just before they get the penta
 http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130622093509/mlpfanart/images/3/30/480px-Troll_Face_Trollface.png
Well i gave a Katarina a Hexakill, last time i give a Penta/Hexa. That person was a notable twat
I never give pentas. They'll start bragging anyway. It's not like they'll let you win anyway if you give it to them. If they did they'd report that one player who got it.
Penta kills are earnt, not given.
